title: Decrease in AD - increase in unplanned inventories

content.prompt: An unanticipated decrease in aggregate demand when the economy is in equilibrium will result in

choices.label: a decrease in the natural rate of unemployment
an increase in the rate of inflation

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
